sections.heading: Unemancipated minor; persons authorized to acceptA donation made to an unemancipated minor may be accepted by a parent or other ascendant of the minor or by his tutor, even if the person who accepts is also the donor
sections.text: Acts 1988, No. 546, ยง1; Acts 2008, No. 204, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2009.
